attributes.additional_details: No longer make fireworks that make noise. These fireworks being set off at the moment sound like bombs are going off. Constantly being set off, even on a weekday up to 1am sometimes longer when children have to get up for school and people for work!
attributes.background: Ban noisy fireworks. They are affecting people with PTSD, children and all different animals.

rejection.details:
There are several open petitions on this issue, such as: 

Reduce the sound of fireworks to under 80 decibels for humans and animals
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/739674

Reduce the maximum noise level for consumer fireworks from 120 to 90 decibels
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/738192
